page.title: 12MY GRANDAD'S SCHOOL DAY (2)
page.content: In the afternoon we wrote a composition and then reading, geography and histroy and perhaps some painting or drawing. At 4.00 we went home. It would take us until 5.30 to get home because we played chase and catch with a donkey witch was left to grange by the side of the road. When I got home tea would be ready. We would have plain steam pudding and gravy first and then followed by stew and vegetabels out of the garden. After tea at about 6.30 my brother and I would feed our 5 horses. Before we went in we fed the rabbit again. We then had our supper of bread, cheese and milk. At 8.30 it was time for bed for my brother and I in our feather bed.
